name: Senses by David Bianchi Dogan Demir & PLS&TY

metadata.name: Senses #1
metadata.description:
The First Audio-Visual Generative Poetic collection on the blockchain.

Senses is a healing audio-visual poetic journey through the mind-body and spirit that is based on 100 original poems written/performed by David Bianchi inspired by the five human senses.

Each piece incorporates generative psychedelic art by Dogan Demir coded from data from David's poetic recordings, as well as healing Solfeggio frequency music by EDM producer 
PLS&TY .

The owner of each piece will hold the commercial re-sale and publishing rights to David's poetry as well as access to metaverse immersive sound baths and IRL experiences in major markets.
